courses.title: Sequences and Series
courses.description: A comprehensive exploration of sequences and series, covering arithmetic and geometric progressions, convergence, and infinite sums.
courses.prerequisites: Elementary algebra till 10th standard level is sufficient. It would help to be familiar with the language of sets and functions.
courses.relevantExams: JEE Main, JEE Advanced, ISI, CMI

courses.title: Binomial Theorem
courses.description: Understanding the binomial theorem, binomial coefficients, Pascal's triangle, and applications to algebraic expansions.
courses.relevantExams: JEE Main, JEE Advanced, ISI, CMI

courses.title: Introduction to Calculus
courses.description: Foundations of differential and integral calculus, limits, derivatives, and their applications.

courses.title: Real Analysis I
courses.description: Rigorous treatment of sequences, series, continuity, and differentiability in the real number system.

courses.title: Linear Algebra Fundamentals
courses.description: Vector spaces, linear transformations, matrices, eigenvalues, and applications.
